title: Padre Island National Seashore: Prairies and Grasslands
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Natural Features & Ecosystems     Prairies and Grasslands                Prairies and Grasslands         The grasslands west of the Malaquite Visitor Center on a clear day. NPS photo  Most of the islandâ€™s terrain consists of coastal prairie interspersed with ephemeral marshes and dune fields (see under Sand Dunes). Grassland habitats are dominated by small, rolling hummocks covered with salt tolerant vegetation such as seacoast bluestem and bushy bluestem.
